title: Remove header logo entirely and revert CO₂ units/scaling to percentages

requirements.text: Remove the dashboard header logo entirely so the header displays only the existing title/subtitle text block (no logo image, no logo wrapper spacing), and remove any logo-related UI in the header.

quotes: ok, doe eens ALLES van het logo weg, enkel titel. Ook alles die te maken heeft met het logo

acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/pages/TemperatureDashboardPage.tsx, the logo element and its surrounding logo-only wrapper are removed from the header layout.
The header still shows the title "Conceptmachine Live Data" and the subtitle "data logging • Updated every 10-20 min" with clean alignment and spacing.
There is no user-facing logo-related text (e.g., no logo error/fallback messages) anywhere in the header.

requirements.text: Update CO₂ data parsing so that all three CO₂ series are in percent (%): keep "CO2 CSV(%)" in its original unit (no x10000 conversion) and manually scale "CO2 Rechts" and "CO2 Links" by multiplying each by 0.001.

quotes: ik had je verteld dat CO2 CSV x10000 moest gedaan worden maar dat mag weer naar het originele "CO2 CSV(%)"
CO2 Rechts mag x0.001 gedaan worden manueel
alle 3 de co2 elementen staan dan in (%)

acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/lib/temperatureParsing.ts, "CO2 CSV(%)" is parsed as a numeric percent value and is NOT multiplied by 10000.
In frontend/src/lib/temperatureParsing.ts, parsed values for "CO2 Rechts" and "CO2 Links" are each multiplied by 0.001 before being stored in TemperatureDataPoint.
After parsing, TemperatureDataPoint.co2Right, TemperatureDataPoint.co2Left, and TemperatureDataPoint.co2CSV all represent percentages (%).
Existing timestamp parsing, numeric normalization (comma decimals), and chronological sorting behavior remains intact.

requirements.text: Update the CO₂ chart labels/legend/tooltip and axis labeling to reflect percentages (%), including changing the CO₂ CSV series label to "CO2 CSV (%) - dashed" (and removing any "ppm" wording).

quotes: alle 3 de co2 elementen staan dan in (%)
dat mag weer naar het originele "CO2 CSV(%)"

acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/components/CO2Chart.tsx, legend and tooltip labels use percent wording (no "ppm" anywhere).
The CO₂ CSV series is labeled exactly "CO2 CSV (%) - dashed" in both legend and tooltip.
The Y-axis label indicates percent (e.g., includes "(%)") so the unit is visible on the chart.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
Do not change the Google Apps Script endpoint URL used for fetching data.
nonGoals: Do not add new logo assets or replace the logo with another image.
Do not change temperature chart behavior, styling, or the synced zoom/pan behavior across charts beyond what is required for the CO₂ unit changes.
Do not introduce new backend canister methods or change backend behavior for this request.
